Disulfiram ( 19), an approved drug for the treatment of chronic alcohol dependence, has a great potential for drug repurposing because it has been shown to inhibit PLpro of MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV.
26 The antimetabolites 6-mercaptopurine ( 20) and 6-thioguanine ( 21) are additional drugs inhibiting PLpro ( Scheme 3 ).
